title: Sushi Kitchen
description: Japanese meatless cafe. Nicely decorated and air-conditioned. Offers vegan sushi, tempura, fried noodle, noodle soup, fried rice, porridge, green tea. Sit on tatami mat or regular chair. Has a small library. Better to make advance reservation. Located diagonally behind Chong Cheng primary school (崇正小學) in Sungai Ara.
streetAddress: 2A-1 1Fl, Jalan Sungai Ara, Desa Ara, Sungai Ara, Bayan Lepas
